description: The VISION of the KCPD is: To make Kansas City and the metropolitan area the safest community i the nation as a result of the efforts of the Kansas City Missouri Police Department and its many partners. [...] We experienced many historically significant things in 2014 for which to be grateful: the city's lowest homicide rate in 42 years, a Headquarters IE building fully renovated for the first time in 76 years and a chance to shine in the national spotlight as the Kansas City Royals played in the World Series for the first time in 29 years. [...] The changes brought much needed space and modernity to the iconic home of the KCPD while staying loyal to the building's history. [...] The renovation said the original goal of the remodel was just to fix the spaces provided adequate space and up-to-date facilities for 266 that had been largely untouched since 1938: the second, administrative and investigative employees of the Kansas City third and seventh floors. abstract: The VISION of the KCPD is: To make Kansas City and the metropolitan area the safest community i the nation as a result of the efforts of the Kansas City Missouri Police Department and its many partners. [...] We experienced many historically significant things in 2014 for which to be grateful: the city's lowest homicide rate in 42 years, a Headquarters IE building fully renovated for the first time in 76 years and a chance to shine in the national spotlight as the Kansas City Royals played in the World Series for the first time in 29 years. [...] The changes brought much needed space and modernity to the iconic home of the KCPD while staying loyal to the building's history. [...] The renovation said the original goal of the remodel was just to fix the spaces provided adequate space and up-to-date facilities for 266 that had been largely untouched since 1938: the second, administrative and investigative employees of the Kansas City third and seventh floors. [...] The marble was The building formerly served as J. E. took place in the community room, removed, cleaned and then reinstalled in Dunn Headquarters and was acquired located at the bottom of the tower. [...] Expo-West 2014 Sergeant Keith Ericsson of the Training Paying attention in class paid off for Unit assisted with the logistics of bringing Fleet Operations Manager Darrell Cooper the vehicles and placing them at the and the Kansas City Missouri Police track for the Ride & Drive Event.
